Changelog:
❗Important Update❗

🛠️ Fixed Bugs:
🔹 🎙️ Voice typing daily limit bug for free users — now increased to 1600 characters per day! ⏳
🔹 'Remember Word Selection' bug.
🔹 Distorted text in the word suggestion window.
🔹 Trial use bug for free version users.

🚀 Improvements:
🔸 Enhanced Gemini AI features for improved accuracy.
🔸 Better Google suggestions for smarter results.

📅 New Features:
🟣 Customize the date format to suit your preference!
🟣 It can now suggest the current time as well! ⏰
🟣 Drag and drop text directly onto Kontho's top bar for quick access and edit! 📋
